Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Stallion \Stal"lion\ (st[a^]l"y[u^]n), n. [OE. stalon, OF. estalon, F. ['e]talon, fr. OHG. stal a stable. See {Stall}, n.] A male horse not castrated; a male horse kept for breeding. [1913 Webster]
stallion n : uncastrated adult male horse [syn: {entire}]
